text: læa nı hmu xahrab chnbth nan mi phu sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa wan xa khi reaa hˌ læa thux xea sing thi tn bricakh pi nan penkar kıl chi dkabxallxhˌ læa penkar khx phr khxng rx sul phung ru theid wa thæcring man penkar thahı kıl chid kæ phwk khea xallxhˌ ca thrng hı phwk khea xyu nı khwam xendu metta khxng phraxngkh thæ cring xallxhˌ nan pen phuthrng xphaythosʹ thrng xendu metta semx
